text:
@electroboyusa Florida here. Add Florida to that list. While there's supposed decreases, I no longer believe what is being put out by Florida. People are running around maskless & social distancing is going by the wayside. Ntm #WhereAreTheTests?
#Covid19 #RonDesantis is a fool.
